Simple Search {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/about}} !!! Keyboard accessible * Press Cmd + P to ''launch'' or ''close'' Simple Search (same as Notion, or define your own shortcut [[in the control panel|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/KeyboardShortcuts]]). * Navigate with Tab ** {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/advanced-search}} takes you to $:/AdvancedSearch ** the next Tab jumps to the search results. Depending on your browser and settings, you can select a list item using Tab or up and down arrow keys, finally confirm your choice with Enter. !!! Search in fields Primary results are listed for tiddlers containing the search term in the ''title'' OR the ''caption'' fields. The secondary list finds results based on all other fields (not title nor caption). This can be adapted via settings. !!! Create tiddlers Empty result list? No problem. Create missing tiddlers using the search term as title and caption. * Hit Tab until you reach the plus button (+). * Create a tiddler with Enter. See template options on the ''settings tab''. – Hat tip to //Diego Mesa// for inspiring this feature. !!! Settings Make sure to visit the ''settings tab'' to adjust your preferences. !! Core overruling This plugin overwrites $:/core/ui/SideBarSegments/search and nothing else. !! Settings An options button is available on the search layer so you can always return to these settings when necessary. <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/hide-options-button.css" invertTag="yes" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> show the {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/options}} button !!! Design ''Layer animation:'' Simple Search feels rather slow for values above 150, so make sure to check this TW setting.
<$link to="$:/config/AnimationDuration"><> <$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/AnimationDuration" default="" tag="input"/> ''Search box border:'' Adapt the colour to the design of your wiki. Use //transparent// if you don’t want a border.
[[Border colour:|$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/settings/border-colour]] <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/settings/border-colour" tag="input"/> <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/settings/border-colour" type="color" tag="input"/> !!! Search button <$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/PageControlButtons/Visibility/$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/search" field="text" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="show"> show in Page Toolbar (in the sidebar) <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/search" tag="$:/tags/TopRightBar"> show in Top Right Bar (besides the sidebar toggle, permanently visible) !!! Minimal search term length !!! Fields to search This list defines, which fields are relevant for the secondary result list (“Other”). The default value `-caption,title` leads to searches in all fields except caption and title. See [[search operator documentation|https://tiddlywiki.com/#search%20Operator]] for more info. !!! Create new tiddlers <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/hide-new-button.css" invertTag="yes" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> show the {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/omni-search-bar/ui/Buttons/new-tiddler}} button Define the template for new tiddlers you can create based on search terms. The default value `{{$:/temp/advancedsearch}}` inserts your search term as title and caption. Use the following field to add tags to tiddlers created via Simple Search. Don’t forget to add brackets to tags containing spaces, e.g. `[[My Tag]] Foo Bar`. --- !!! Search layer edit mode Would you like to edit the tiddler $:/Search?
